rules.description: Left cmd + hjkl to arrow keys Vim
Change caps_lock to left_option if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
Change ; to right_cmd when held, ; when tapped.
Change tab to left_control when held, tab when tapped.
Home row mods - a: cmd, s: opt, d: shift, f: ctrl
Home row mods - j: ctrl, k: shift, l: opt, ;: cmd (right hand) + Escape combinations
Home row mods - j: ctrl, k: shift, l: opt, ;: cmd (right hand) + left control
Home row mods - j: ctrl, k: shift, l: opt, ;: cmd (right hand)
